name: My User Scripts
body:
##Debugging
###[AJAX Listener](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/AJAXListener.user.js)
A simple AJAX listener that intercepts all AJAX requests made on a page and logs them to the console for review.

###[Enable Logging](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/EnableLogging.user.js)
Enables Stack Overflow's built in logging / debugging system.

##Chat
###[Moderation Request Archiver](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/CVRequestArchiver.user.js)
Provides an interface to archive formatted moderation requests in a given chat room. Must be a room owner or moderator of the current room for the interface to show up. This is an old version, the [newest version](https://github.com/SO-Close-Vote-Reviewers/UserScripts/blob/master/CVRequestArchiver.user.js) is being maintained by the [SOCVR](https://github.com/SO-Close-Vote-Reviewers) More information to come.

###[Moderation Request Generator](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/CVRequestGenerator.user.js)
Provides an interface to automate the formatting and sending of moderation requests from chat to a given chat room. Currently only works for close vote requests. More information to come.

###[Trainwreck](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/Trainwreck.user.js)
Provides an interface to automate the formatting and sending of a message to the current chat room. Format is `[#RekdTrain](link to random image of trainwreck)`. More information to come.

##Main Site
###[Inline Editing Everywhere](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/InlineEditingEverywhere.user.js)
Enables inline editing even if you don't have the inline editing privilege on a given site. Edits must still go through review if you don't have the editing privilege. More information to come.

###[Sticky Vote Controls](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/StickyVoteControls.user.js)
Voting controls stick to the top of the page when scrolling down a long post. More information to come.

##Review
###[Magic Tag Review](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/MagicTagReview.user.js)
Provides a new review interface for reviewing questions in a specific tag based on close or delete votes. A new section is provided one the /review page. This will continue to exist but is going to be superseded by the new Magic Review Tool which will have many more features. More information to come.

###[NATO Enhancements](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/NATOEnhancements.user.js)
Loads the full post and question as they would be seen in the wild with all controls enabled. More information to come.

###[NATO Hide Questions](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/NATOHideQuestions.user.js)
Hides the questions loaded by the NATO Enhancements script, this will eventually be merged as an option into the NATO Enhancements script. 

###[Review Enhancements](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/ReviewEnhancements.user.js)
Loads all posts as they would be seen in the wild with all controls enabled while in review. More information to come.

###[Votes Page Enhancements](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/VotesPageEnhancements.user.js)
Loads posts as they would be seen in the wild with all controls enabled on your votes page. Useful for reviewing posts that you have voted on.

###[Thing Checker](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/ThingChecker.user.js)
A proof of concept audit detection script which intercepts the review AJAX requests and looks for the `isAudit` property of the returned JSON object. This is not intended to be used. If you use it, you run the risk of being manually review banned. A better option is to review to the best of your ability and report any bad audits on meta. A review ban incurred by multiple bad audits can be lifted by moderators if the bad audits are indeed bad audits.

##Styling
###[SO Dark](https://github.com/Tiny-Giant/myuserscripts/blob/master/SODark.user.js)

This is really buggy right now, best to just not use this yet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
